testsuite.name: dungeonmania.mvp.BattleTest

testcase.name: Test basic health calculations spider - player wins
Test the player battles three enemies consecutively and defeats them
Test ally gives attack and defence bonus
Test player battles mercenary and mercenary dies
Test player battles mercenary and player dies
Test basic health calculations zombie - player wins
Test shield reduces enemy attack
Test sword increases attack damage
Test a player wins a battle against a mercenary with an invincibility potion
Test player wins a battle against a zombie with an invincibility potion
Test player battles zombie and zombie dies
Test bow durability
Test sword durability
Test basic health calculations mercenary - player loses
Test player battles spider and spider dies
Test player wins a battle against a spider with an invinicibility potion
Test attack twice with bow - spider
Test basic health calculations spider - player loses
Test basic health calculations zombie - player loses
Test basic health calculations mercenary - player wins
Test player battles spider and player dies
Test player battles zombie and player dies
Test shield durability
